idlastro/

tab_col.pro


top source tab_col

tab_col, tcb, column, offset, width, datatype, name, units, format

NAME: TAB_COL PURPOSE: Procedure to extract column information from table control block

CALLING SEQUENCE: tab_col, tcb, column, offset, width, datatype, name, units, format

INPUTS: tcb - table control block returned by tab_open. column - column name (string) or column number

OUTPUTS: offset - column offset bytes width - column width in bytes datatype - column data type: 6 - real*4 7 - real*8 4 - integer*4 1 - boolean 2 - character string name - column name units - column units format - format code

SIDE EFFECTS: If the column is not found then !err is set to -1. Otherwise !err is set to the column number (starting at one).

HISTORY: version 1 D. Lindler Jan 88 Converted to NEW IDL April 90 Converted to IDL V5.0 W. Landsman September 1997

Parameters

tcb
column
offset
